explains: n. 和；[生理] 总和；合计

sentences.en: What he said was a fair summation of the discussion.
sentences.cn: 他这番话对讨论作了恰当的总结。

sentences.en: The exhibition presents a summation of the artist's career.
sentences.cn: 展览全面体现了这位画家的艺术生涯。

sentences.en: Her introduction is a model of fairness, a lively summation of Irish history.
sentences.cn: 她的导论是公正的典范，是对爱尔兰历史的总结。
